item.title: Makeing freezeing spells work? on a ds base
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

public void autoCastBarrage() { if (autoCastTime == 0) { hitDiff = misc.random(30); stillgfx(369, absY, absX); setAnimation(1979); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; autoCastTime = 70; PkingDelay = 10; deleteItem(555, getItemSlot(555), 6); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4); deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 2); } else if (playerLevel[6] <= 94) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell!"); } }
